localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: What's daunting about self-learning is not unknown, but not knowing what's unknown. It's like fumbling in a dark room with a lighter not knowing how big it is. WarmMachine maps domain concepts in machine learning and lights the room up for self-learners.
nodes.title: WarmMachine - Your personal knowledge manager
nodes.author: Quinn Dai

nodes.excerpt: Save email messages from Gmail to your Notion workspace.
nodes.title: Send Gmail to Notion - Save email messages from Gmail to your Notion workspace
nodes.author: Amit Agarwal

nodes.excerpt: Create a vector or raster graphic for your project in no time with (almost) a single button. New images are generated on the fly and the chances of seeing exactly the same picture twice approach 0. New graphical features are added several times a week.
nodes.title: chaosMachine - One-click unique graphics generator
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Notion Template that helps you track your investments Features: ï»¿ğŸ“‹ï»¿ Accounts: Hold the different items in your portfolio ï»¿ğŸ“§ï»¿ Asset Classes: Group of investments having similar traits ï»¿ğŸ­ï»¿ Portfolio: Lists every asset in your portfolio Get it now!
nodes.title: Notion Portfolio Manager - Notion template to track your investments
nodes.author: Sarthak Sharma

nodes.excerpt: GrowthRanker is a website that ranks startups based on Stripe-verified revenue data. It enables founders to build in public and get discovered and allows investors to find the next unicorn.
nodes.title: GrowthRanker - Discover the next unicorn
nodes.author: Shar Darafsheh

nodes.excerpt: Unlock the full potential of collaborative workflow automation with the team version of Automate.io. Connect your business apps and automate repetitive processes collaboratively with your team to boost business growth and productivity.
nodes.title: Automate.io - Enabling teams to automate work collaboratively
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: A free Internet is a better Internet. The Free Internet Plugin removes known paywalled sites from your Google search results. It is open-sourced on HackerNoon's GitHub. F*ck paywalls.
nodes.title: The Free Internet Plugin - Removes paywalled stories from Google results
nodes.author: David Smooke

nodes.excerpt: Tired of your URLs being just too darn short? Worry no further, as Ax56 has got your back. No need to be anxious about people thinking the size of your URL is too small, as it will guaranteed be the largest one around. What are you waiting for, give it a go!
nodes.title: URL Lengthener - Tired of URLs being just too short? Lengthen them x56
nodes.author: Piero Maddaleni

nodes.excerpt: LoginRadius for Developers is a developer community tool to integrate secure Authentication and Single Sign-On (SSO) with a single code. On top of that, it lets you easily manage your users from dashboard.
nodes.title: LoginRadius Authentication - Secure and robust authentication, SSO with user management
nodes.author: Deepak Gupta

nodes.excerpt: We were running through the Y Combinator interview Q's we found online and I thought it'd be best to have us answer them randomly, with a 10 second timer and running for 10 minutes each time - just to add some realism to the simulation. It's coded terribly.
nodes.title: YC Random - Random YCombinator interview questions every 10 seconds
nodes.author: Aleks Dahlberg

nodes.excerpt: Your currently playing track from Spotify & Apple Music, displayed right on your desktop. Super customizable with easy preferences to let you change everything about Sleeve, including size, style, position, layout, track info and more!
nodes.title: Sleeve - Your currently playing track displayed right on your desktop
nodes.author: Kasper Villum Jensen

nodes.excerpt: CloudMounter is an ultimate cloud storage manager with native Apple silicon support, that allows accessing all information in the most popular cloud storage accounts. And work directly with the online files with no sync to local computer.
nodes.title: CloudMounter for Mac 3.8 - Ultimate cloud storage manager with native M1 support
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Coffee Chats is a no-code platform that lets you build a website that is connected with your Google Calendar, making it super easy to host free or paid virtual coffee chats, meetings and consulting calls (think Calendly meets Carrd in one free app).
nodes.title: Coffee Chats - If Calendly and Carrd had a baby
nodes.author: Chris Tung

nodes.excerpt: Lofi Club is a place for listening to live 24/7 Lofi music. Comes with more than 17+ tracks, Live Chat, Distraction-free music player, to-do list, Pomodoro timer, keyboard control, playlist, fullscreen mode makes the app super productive for daily use!
nodes.title: Lofi Club - Enjoy hip hop beats to relax or study
nodes.author: Savio Martin

nodes.excerpt: A chart is worth a thousand data points. Have you seen the "Year Progress" charts on twitter? What if you can create any chart type - Bar, sparklines, tables and use it right inside the twitter text box?
nodes.title: Tweetable Charts - Create text based charts you can directly embed on Twitter
nodes.author: Shabda Raaj

nodes.excerpt: Create your own mini-website for your audience with a click of a button. We provide our service for free and it's called Biotree.
nodes.title: Biotree - Collect, organize and share your links
nodes.author: Harsh Vardhan Goswami

nodes.excerpt: Everyone should be able to tailor software to their own needs. This public beta is the first step towards a whole new set of building blocks to make that vision a reality. And this is just the beginning â€” we'll continue making changes based on your feedback.
nodes.title: Notion API beta - Connect Notion to the tools you use every day
nodes.author: Ben Lang

nodes.excerpt: Brainbase File is The Modern Way to Fileâ„¢. Everything a founder needs to get approved quickly, without a lawyer - real-time trademark search, AI-powered class recommendations, domain and social media handle registration, and application tracking throughout. Start filing at brainbase.com/file for just $199!
nodes.title: Brainbase File  - Clean, simple & automated trademark filing
nodes.author: Nate Cavanaugh

nodes.excerpt: Today, weâ€™re launching our next-generation no-code platform to empower a million people to create the software they need themselves. The next version of Stacker has arrived: https://blog.stackerhq.com/announcing-the-next-version-of-stacker/
nodes.title: Stacker 2.0 - Our next-generation no-code platform is here
nodes.author: Michael Skelly

nodes.excerpt: You can easily create your website in minutes just on your mobile, put all messengers to make your customers happy easy and fast contacts.
nodes.title: mssg.me - Mobile, No-code, free and simple to use website builder
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Auditoriums on Pluto.video let you host talks and events in 3D worlds! - Look around and feel the presence of the crowd - Naturally transition between talks and socializing with attendees - Gather your community around shared interests and create serendipity
nodes.title: Pluto Auditorium - Virtual events that feel like the real world
nodes.author: Katsuya

nodes.excerpt: Tack allows you to track time your team spent on projects or tasks and makes beautiful visual reports that can be shared with your clients, helps you gain valuable insights on projects, revenue, team performance in real-time.
nodes.title: Tack - All new time tracking & greater insights
nodes.author: Sachin

nodes.excerpt: A new tool by Iconshock which compiles absolutely all the open source icon packs out there, 20k+ free icons in one place. With proper tagging, SVG optimized, recolor tool, search function & downloads in SVG, PNG and webP. All icons with commercial use allowed!
nodes.title: VectorIcons by Iconshock - All the open source icons tagged & optimized in one site
nodes.author: Juan Sarmiento
